name: My Toy Piano
description:
To whoever see, this is my first game that I ever made.  Its a very simple simulation game where in you can play a toy keyboard or piano. in a Gameboy rom files. yes you can play this on any Gameboy emulator or by using a flash cartridge.  the game was developed using GB studio  (https://www.gbstudio.dev/)  this is just a prototype game for somewhat future projects. to test my skills in learning various software and programs while I'm learning to code and program. 

just explore the game, and have a little fun. Leave some comments and feedback for improvement and future projects.

Thank you to the team or person behind GB studio, for inspiring not just gamers but also future game makers


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How the game was being made  

Graphics: made by using Pixel Studio   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1204050/Pixel_Studio_for_pixel_art/

Sounds: created by using GB Studio. for audiophiles. sounds are pitch to standard middle C or C4- C5  sound frequency ranging from 262 hertz - 523 hertz, using the GB studio sound effects. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Inspiration behind 

Im fond of playing keyboards or piano, playing Gameboy games with other video game consoles, and PCs.  it's unique to see a musical instrument to be played as a simulation in a gameboy.  it's also challenge to test skills in making games.
